comments: Creates a new custom OAuth scope for an application. You must specify the Id of the application you are creating the scope for.
You can optionally specify an Id for the custom scope on the URL, if not provided one will be generated.

params.name: applicationId
comments: The Id of the application to create the custom scope on.

params.name: scopeId
comments: (Optional) The Id of the custom scope. If not provided a secure random UUID will be generated.

params.name: request
comments: The request object that contains all the information used to create the custom OAuth scope.
